author: Quinn Keaney
title: In Memoriam Tribute at the 2017 Oscars | POPSUGAR Entertainment
text:
In Memoriam Tribute at the 2017 Oscars Sara Bareilles Leaves Everyone Awestruck With Her Oscars In Memoriam Performance February 26, 2017 Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. See @SaraBareilles perform the In Memoriam segment on the #Oscars . pic.twitter.com/ql463kTAak 
â€” Alan Henry (@AlanHenry) February 27, 2017 
It's no surprise that the Oscars were full of amazing moments on Sunday night. After the hustle and bustle of the red carpet died down, and the first batch awards were handed out, the show paid tribute to the artists Hollywood tragically lost both in 2016 and in 2017 . Following an introduction from Jennifer Aniston, Sara Bareilles sang a gorgeous rendition of Joni Mitchell's "Both Sides, Now" as a video commemorating iconic stars like Carrie Fisher , Prince , Anton Yelchin, and Mary Tyler Moore played. Given the shocking death of Bill Paxton earlier on Sunday, it was a heart-wrenching moment for all watching.
